description: Tree works in rear garden subject to TPO 21 Carleton Road, N7 No.153 1996.   Works: Ash(T6):  Crown reduce by no more than 20% of crown height, by pruning back to lateral branch junctions of diameter of at least half the diameter of the shoot/branch to be removed. This is to inhibit regrowth from points of cut. Tidy up broken branch stubs and remove hangers.  Maintain an aesthetic shape and flowing branch line.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
